terms.app-description: This app showcases the usage of the EUDA API of Bosch eBike Systems
terms.getting-started-1: Select one of the options depending on the Bosch eBike System you use
terms.getting-started-click: Click here to display the next steps
terms.getting-started-2: Follow these steps to get started:

option-a.title: Option A - SingleKey ID Account + eBike Flow App
option-a.subtitle: Smart System
option-a.content-2: Have a Bosch-powered eBike using the Smart System
option-a.content-3: Get the eBike Flow app and log in with your SingleKey ID account
option-a.content-4: Connect your eBike with the Flow app and take a ride
option-a.step-1-content-1: Log in to https://portal.bosch-ebike.com/data-act using your SingleKey ID account
option-a.step-1-content-2: Select I am a user and accept the terms and conditions
option-a.step-1-content-3: Create a client application with the following specs
option-a.step-2-content-1: Log in to https://flow.bosch-ebike.com/data-act using your SingleKey ID account
option-a.step-2-content-2: On the Data Act page grant your client application access to your eBike's data
option-a.step-3-content-1: Visit the Open eBike login page
option-a.step-3-content-2: Enter the client ID you noted in step 3

option-b.title: Option B - eBike Connect + eBike Connect App
option-b.subtitle: Bosch eBike System 2
option-b.content-2: Have a Bosch-powered eBike using the Bosch eBike System 2
option-b.content-3: Get the eBike Connect app and log in with your eBike Connect account
option-b.content-4: Connect your eBike with the Flow app and take a ride
option-b.step-1-content-1: Log in to https://portal.bosch-ebike.com/data-act using your eBike Connect account (by clicking on "Are you Bosch eBike Connect user? Log in here"
option-b.step-1-content-2: Select I am a user and accept the terms and conditions
option-b.step-1-content-3: Create a client application with the following specs
option-b.step-2-content-1: Log in to https://flow.bosch-ebike.com/data-act using your eBike Connect account
option-b.step-2-content-2: On the Data Act page grant your client application access to your eBike's data
option-b.step-3-content-1: Visit the Open eBike login page
option-b.step-3-content-2: Enter the client ID you noted in step 3

option-c.title: Option C - SingleKey ID + COBI.Bike App
option-c.subtitle: Bosch eBike System 2
option-c.content-2: Have a Bosch-powered eBike using the Bosch eBike System 2
option-c.content-3: Get the COBI.Bike app and log in with your SingleKey ID account
option-c.content-4: Connect your eBike with the COBI.Bike app and take a ride
option-c.step-1-content-1: Sign up for SingleKey ID (if you have not done so already as part of option A or C)
option-c.step-1-content-2: Log in to https://portal.bosch-ebike.com/data-act using your SingleKey ID account
option-c.step-1-content-3: Select I am a user and accept the terms and conditions
option-c.step-1-content-4: Create a client application with the following specs
option-c.step-2-content-1: Log in to https://flow.bosch-ebike.com/data-act using your SingleKey ID account
option-c.step-2-content-2: On the Data Act page grant your client application access to your COBI.Bike data
option-c.step-3-content-1: Visit the Open eBike login page
option-c.step-3-content-2: Enter the client ID you noted in step 3

messages.missing-ebikes: Are you missing any eBikes? Grant access to your eBike's data to client application {{clientId}} via the Flow Portal

messages.missing-activities: Are you missing any activities? Grant access to your eBike's data to client application {{clientId}} via the Flow Portal

liability-for-content.title: Liability for content
liability-for-content.text-1: The contents of our pages were created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness and timeliness of the content. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages under the general laws according to § 7 para.1 TMG. According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, we are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored foreign information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
liability-for-content.text-2: Obligations to remove or block the use of information according to general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the time of knowledge of a concrete infringement. If we become aware of such infringements, we will remove this content immediately.

liability-for-links.title: Liability for links
liability-for-links.text-1: Our offer contains links to external websites of third parties, on whose contents we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal contents were not recognizable at the time of linking.
liability-for-links.text-2: However, a permanent control of the contents of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a violation of the law. If we become aware of any infringements, we will remove such links immediately.

data-protection.title: Data protection
data-protection.text-1: The use of our website is generally possible without providing personal data. Insofar as personal data (for example, name, address or e-mail addresses) are collected on our pages, this is always done, as far as possible, on a voluntary basis. This data will not be passed on to third parties without your express consent.
data-protection.text-2:
We point out that data transmission over the Internet (e.g. communication by e-mail) security gaps. A complete protection of data against access by third parties is not possible.
The use of contact data published within the framework of the imprint obligation by third parties for the purpose of sending unsolicited advertising and information materials is hereby expressly prohibited. The operators of the pages expressly reserve the right to take legal action in the event of the unsolicited sending of advertising information, such as spam e-mails.
